item.title: Linux TCP SYN Retransmission
item.description: tcp_syn_retries Default value is 6, which corresponds to 63 seconds from first SYN packet till the last retransmission with initial RTO of 1 second. 63 seconds is 1+2+4+‚Ä¶+32, but the connection will not time out until another 64 seconds have passed, totaling 127 seconds.

item.title: Taking Notes
item.description: Organizing Notes Capture ideas on the go with Tana Capture. Turn them into organized fleet notes. Keep a private journal for complex tasks. Nurture evergreen notes from fleet notes and journals.

item.title: GitHub personal access token to perform Git operations over HTTPS
item.description: Create a fine-grained personal access token with ‚ÄúContents‚Äù permission to Repositories you have selected. Configure Git to store credentials on disk: git config --global credential.helper store (Credentials are stored in plaintext!) Access the repo via https with your username and the personal access token as password.

item.title: Rebasing a patched Linux kernel on openEuler Copr (EUR)
nixpkgs
item.description: Nix Channels nixos.org/manual/nixpkgs/unstable/#overview-of-nixpkgs Packages, including the Nix packages collection, are distributed through channels.

item.title: WeeChat
item.description: See also WeeChat Config. Switch between buffers Press Alt+number to switch to the corresponding numbered buffer. To switch between server and WeeChat core buffers, press Ctrl+X.

item.title: pwru
item.description: Requirements pwru requires >= 5.3 kernel to run. For --output-skb >= 5.9 kernel is required. (Will auto-detect) For --backend=kprobe-multi >= 5.18 kernel is required.

item.title: Package Managers Map
item.description: For use in $HOME: github.com/conda-forge/miniforge, with the conda-forge channel set as the default (and only) channel. For deterministic and declarative configuration: Nix with nix-installer, and home-mangler for a lightweight package-only alternative to home-manager, or nix-darwin for declarative system-wide configuration on macOS.

item.title: top
item.description: Keys e / E, :Enforce-Task-Memory-Scale and :Enforce-Summary-Memory-Scale. Cycle through the available memory scaling which ranges from KiB through EiB.
